job_details.Vacaturetitel: Sr. Software Engineer - GenAI Platform Development
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Contribute to the development of GenAI services that are integral to our product offerings and user experiences.
     * Implement coding best practices to foster code modularity, reusability, and maintainability, enabling our AI services to remain flexible for future advancements.
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI services into the wider product ecosystem, ensuring a smooth developer experience.
     * Assess and optimize existing AI services to enhance performance and conform to the latest industry trends.
     * Support and mentor other engineers, contributing to a culture that values technical skill and code quality.
     * Stay informed on the latest AI technologies and programming techniques, exploring their applicability to our services.
job_details.full_text:
Sr. Software Engineer - GenAI Platform Development

* Contribute to the development of GenAI services that are integral to our product offerings and user experiences.
     * Implement coding best practices to foster code modularity, reusability, and maintainability, enabling our AI services to remain flexible for future advancements.
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI services into the wider product ecosystem, ensuring a smooth developer experience.
     * Assess and optimize existing AI services to enhance performance and conform to the latest industry trends.
     * Support and mentor other engineers, contributing to a culture that values technical skill and code quality.
     * Stay informed on the latest AI technologies and programming techniques, exploring their applicability to our services.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes developing GenAI services, integrating them into products, and optimizing existing AI services. This aligns with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, focusing on building and deploying applications around generative models.

phrases: Contribute to the development of GenAI services that are integral to our product offerings and user experiences.
Implement coding best practices to foster code modularity, reusability, and maintainability, enabling our AI services to remain flexible for future advancements.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI services into the wider product ecosystem, ensuring a smooth developer experience.
Assess and optimize existing AI services to enhance performance and conform to the latest industry trends.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases describe the core activities of building, integrating, and optimizing software, specifically in the context of GenAI services and their incorporation into product offerings.

phrases: Contribute to the development of GenAI services
Assess and optimize existing AI services
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'GenAI services' and 'AI services' directly implies work with generative AI models, including their development and optimization.

phrases: Assess and optimize existing AI services to enhance performance and conform to the latest industry trends.
job_tasks.justification: Optimizing services for performance and ensuring they conform to industry trends are key aspects of maintaining and improving AI systems in production.

phrases: integral to our product offerings and user experiences.
integrate AI services into the wider product ecosystem
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the need to understand how AI services fit into the broader product strategy and user experience, connecting technical work to business goals.

phrases: Stay informed on the latest AI technologies and programming techniques, exploring their applicability to our services.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly speaks to the need for continuous learning and adapting to new technologies in the rapidly evolving AI field.

phrases: Stay informed on the latest AI technologies and programming techniques, exploring their applicability to our services.
Assess and optimize existing AI services to enhance performance
Contribute to the development of GenAI services
Support and mentor other engineers, contributing to a culture that values technical skill and code quality.
